author: David Gilbert, VICE News
title: Anti-Chinese Hate Speech Online Has Skyrocketed Since the Coronavirus Crisis Began
description: “Toxic tweets are using explicit language to accuse Asians of carrying the coronavirus and blaming people of Asian origin as a collective for spreading the virus.”
content:
A new report claims that anti-Chinese hate speech on Twitter has sky-rocketed by 900 percent in response to the coronavirus pandemic.
The report comes from Israeli artificial intelligence startup L1ght, which used its technology to search the internet for in… [+4213 chars]
